Light sees his gargantuan mother stomping around his room for a while until suddenly, she stops. He looks up at her towering figure and eye contact with her. A shiver went down his spine when he saw the mischievous smirk on her face.

"THERE YOU ARE!", she said loudly.

"Mom, I'm sorry about the grades. I'll never do it again.", Light said as he backed away from his mega-sized mother. But she kept stomping towards him. He felt the floor vibrate from the quakes she was causing.

Light chuckled nervously," He he. Mom, I got the message: Never forging grades again. You can stop now."

But his mom kept stomping towards him. He continued to back up until he finally hit the wall. Light was panting heavily. He stared at her huge yellow slippers, fearing that he might be under them soon.

"You keep staring at my slippers.", his mom pointed out. She then began to raise her foot into the air and hover it over Light. Light was too frozen with fear to scream. He was nothing more than an ant compared to her foot. She could crush him with one little step. Sachiko began to lower her foot onto Light.

"MOMMMMM!!!! NOOOOOOOOO!!!", Light screamed. As he crouched and shriveled in fear, he heard his mother laughing. She lowered her foot right next to him. She then took her socked foot out of its fuzzy cavern and began to hover it over Light.

Light got back on his feet, believing that his mother was just toying with him.

"Very funny, mom. Now help me get back to normal.", he said. Just then, he felt the moist sweaty fibers of her gym sock on top of his head.

"Haha, mom. You can stop now." he said, hoping she would stop playing. But she continued to press the fibers of her sock against her minuscule son.

"HOW'S IT SMELL?", she asked with a booming voice and a smirk on her face.

Light couldn't help but smell her socked foot. It smelled...well.. like a sock; a musky, vinegar/cheese-like smell. The sock looked like a regular white sock that had been worn for a few days: white with a few yellowish stains from all the sweat and dirt. Light had never known how badly his mother's foot stink was but he wasn't surprised, considering that she tends to wear the same thing for days due to her busy schedule. She smothered him with her smelly sock for a few minutes and then withdraw it.

She then crouched down and picked up her pint-size son. She brought him up to face-level and said, "Well? How did it smell?"

"Smell me and see for yourself." Light replied with a pissed off tone.

Sachiko's smirk became a frown.

"I WAS TOYING WITH YOU, DESPITE THE FACT THAT YOU GOT ALL D's ON YOUR REPORT CARD AND THEN TRIED TO FOOL ME AND YOUR FATHER. To think that I was going to take care of you while we found a cure. I was thinking that the fact that you were 2 inches tall would make you at least a little bit humble.", she said as she was walking to the door.

"What I did was wrong but it was not nearly as bad as almost crushing your son with your REPULSIVE, DISGUSTING, HUGE SMELLY FEET!" Light yelled.

Just as he said that, Light got the feeling that things were going to get worse.

Sachiko slammed the door shut.

"Huge, disgusting, repulsive feet, huh?!", she said in a calm tone.

She walked back to her slipper and sat down. She placed Light on her slipper and chuckled," Looks like I found the perfect punishment for you. You see, that slipper you are standing on is something I got when I was 17. And I have had them since. Granted, they most likely do smell but, man, are they comfy. The only thing that could make them more comfortable is a 2 inch tall footboy that will massage and kiss my foot." She glared at Light and nudged him towards the opening. Light refused however.

He looked at the ground to see a huge size 11 stamp on the heel section. He could also smell the foul stench of feet from where he was standing.

"Mom, you're insane if you honestly believe that I am going to worship your feet.", he said.

"It's either that or I hand you to your sister and say," Do whatever you want with him." "

Fearing what his sister would do to him, Light accepted his fate and shuffled slowly into he fuzzy cavern. As soon as he entered his mother's slipper, she said," Don't worry sweetie. I'll be extra careful with you in there. Don't forget to kiss and rub my foot. I put you in the other one after I make dinner and, if you are a good little boy, I give you a special surprise."

When she saw that Light was at the toe section of her slipper, she slid her sock clad foot into it on top of him. The feeling of having him between her smelly slipper and sock was true ecstasy to Sachiko. Light felt the immense weight of his mother as she stood up. As heavy as she was, he did not feel pain because the slipper absorbed the weight. The problem was that he could not move at all. He felt himself leaving the ground with the slipper as his mother began to walk. As her foot landed on the ground, her sweaty sock smothered Light. Light found it hard to breathe. Before Sachiko left the room, she slammed her socked toes against Light, expecting him to kiss them.

"Where are my kisses?", she asked in a sing-songy tone.

Light had no choice. He gave her big toe a quick peck. Sachiko did not feel it and slammed her foot against him again. Light realized what he had to do. He pushed his head into the thick fibers of her sock and stuck his tongue out and licked her toe. She felt a slight tickle and was pleased. Having tasted the foul sweat, sock lint and dirt from his mom's foot, Light knew this was going to be a long day. After dinner,
1533.title: Sachiko sees light on the floor

Shiori has some uneasy tensions with Naomi Misora. She wants to work in law enforcement as a police officer and wishes she could be more like her boyfriend Light who is filled with justice. Shiori disagrees with Kira's methods because she doesn't like the horror and fear they incite in innocent people. Shiori believes that the justice system should judge criminals in a fair trial, not a mass murderer. She argues with Light about this, but shes unaware of the fact that Light is actually Kira in disguise as a normal student.

Spoilers End Here
